videos.description: Herm Edwards joins SVP to break down the Patriots' 23-22 victory over the Bears, with Jimmy Garoppolo finding his rhythm for New England. He says Chicago's starting offense looked improved after being shutout last week.
videos.headline: Bears lose, but starting offense looked better
